moe.wyv.Sad_Bot.commands

Interface BotCommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandCommand, CSGOCommand, HelpCommand, PubgCommand, QueueCommand, QuitCommand, RandomCommand, StrawPollCommand, TimeCommand, UserCommand

    public interface BotCommand
    Interface outlining the structure of a command
    Author:
    fettuccine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate(BotInstance bot, Message message)
      The action that is taken after being triggered by the keyword.
      java.lang.String getHelpReply()
      Used to explain how to use the command.
      java.lang.String getKeyword()
      This method should return a constant String that is more or less the "name" of the command.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name representation of the command to be used in the save file.

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        void activate(BotInstance bot,
              Message message)
        The action that is taken after being triggered by the keyword.
        Parameters:
        bot - this
        message - the message to process

      • getKeyword

        java.lang.String getKeyword()
        This method should return a constant String that is more or less the "name" of the command. The name should be formatted without the preceeding prefix "!" and should not have any spaces. E.g. "quit"
        Returns:
        the word required to activate this command

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name representation of the command to be used in the save file. This should be the same as the class name.
        Returns:
        name of command

      • getHelpReply

        java.lang.String getHelpReply()
        Used to explain how to use the command. Should be an English sentence.
        Returns:
        a message explaining the use of the command
